title: Shopee Traffic Overview Daily Monthly Report
description: Overview of daily and monthly traffic metrics on Shopee platform

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'

Page_Views.description: Total number of page views on Shopee

Avg_Page_Views.description: Average number of page views per visit

Avg_Time_Spent.description: Average time spent on the platform per visit in the format 'HH:mm:ss'

Bounce_Rate.description: Bounce rate, representing the percentage of visitors who navigate away from the site after viewing only one page

Visitors.description: Total number of visitors on Shopee

New_Visitors.description: Number of new visitors on Shopee

Existing_Visitors.description: Number of existing visitors on Shopee
